name: 7SRL
description:
Seven Seas Roguelike

✦

We are four creatives behind the small co-op named Common. This is the demo of a silly little game we made for the 7DRL challenge. We're working on the complete game, follow along to get updates!

 ✦   ✦   ✦

Across the Seven Seas, treasures await the patient explorers in the nooks and crannies of the archipelago...

treasures await in the deepest blue... seven seas, seven levels sometimes it takes that leap of faith : )

 ✦   ✦   ✦

Credits:

Development: Jordan, Benjamin, Callan

Art & Music: Paprika

Music inspired by the Ursula K. le Guin essay collection "The Wave in the Mind"
